description: Configure working mode parameters for the cluster.

check_interval.description: It is the waiting time between two checks of master node status.

failback.description: Which node has the preference to be master. The values can be a name node, to give preference to a node; or disabled, if any node can be master and are no priority for one.

track_interface.description: Interfaces to monitor. It is posible to monitor bond, nic or vlan interfaces. When a monitored interface goes down, the owning node switches to the maintenance state. Keep in mind that It is not posible to modify a monitored interface
